COMMENT_TX: ej,mckej801,M,westj901,Upset lights not turned on Padres manager Jack McKeon ejected by HP umpire Joe West because the umpires had not ordered the stadium lights turned on sometime in game
ej,howek001,P,quicj901,Balls and strikes (after removal by manager) Ken Howell ejected by HP umpire Jim Quick after being removed from the game
$ball 4 called when Sid Fernandez went to his mouth

ej,abnes001,P,monte901,Called third strike Shawn Abner ejected by HP umpire Ed Montague after being called out on strikes and called for interference with the catcher on a stolen base attempt; Montague called the runner out
ej,lasot101,M,bonig901,Call at 3B Dodgers manager Tommy Lasorda ejected by 3B umpire Greg Bonin
$Andy Benes called out for running outside of base line
ej,smitl002,P,hohnb901,Balls and strikes Lonnie Smith ejected by HP umpire Bill Hohn when the fourth pitch was called a strike
ej,clarj001,P,darlg901,Balls and strikes Jack Clark ejected by HP umpire Gary Darling
$pitcher Charlie Liebrandt recovered ball after bounced off shinguard
$Roberto Alomar suffered injured left arm ligaments in collision with Greg Olson
$winning run scored before play could be made at 1B

ej,mckej801,M,westj901,Upset lights not turned on $Padres manager McKeon ejected by HP umpire West for arguing lights were turned off for the bottom of 7th; they were ordered on for the top of the inning, but took 10 minutes to warm up, during which time the Pirates completed their inning; when the Padres came up, West ordered the lights off so they would not have an unfair advantage; McKeon objected and was ejected
ej,howek001,P,quicj901,Balls and strikes $Pitcher Howell ejected by HP umpire Quick for arguing balls and strikes after being removed
